sourcesContent:
Cursos Disponíveis
Nome do Curso {{ courses.name }} Categoria {{ courses.category }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { CoursesService } from '../services/courses.service'; import { Course } from './../model/course'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent implements OnInit { courses$: Observable; displayedColumns = ['name','category']; constructor(private coursesService: CoursesService ) { this.courses$ = this.coursesService.listCoursesAll(); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
